widget.name: Action Scheduler (1.0.1)
widget.description: Schedule an action in your page

property.caption: Enabled
property.description: Use this expression to enable or disable the timer.

property.caption: Interval
property.description: The interval between each action, in milliseconds (ms). This should be bigger than 0.

property.caption: Fire once
property.description: Note: If you set this to true, the interval will act as a delay. Note: This is a dynamic value, so you could change it during the runtime, but this is unwise (as this might have weird consequences). For that, it is better to just use the 'Enabled' value (for example, set 'Enabled' to some counter or condition of the surrounding dataview)
